description: Create column Sex at index 2 based on column full using expression grel:if(value.startsWith('Thiru'),'Male','Female')
Create column Days at index 5 based on column end using expression grel:diff(value.toDate("d.M.y"), row.cells['start'].value.toDate("d.M.y"),'months')
Create column Name at index 2 based on column full using expression grel:value.replace(' I.A.S.','')
Text transform on cells in column Name using expression grel:trim(value.replace(/Tmt.|Thiru.|D[rR]./,''))
Text transform on cells in column Name using expression grel:value.replace(',','')
Text transform on cells in column Payscale Remarks using expression grel:value.replace('in the Pay Matrix','')

urlExpression: grel:'http://127.0.0.1:8084/' + value.replace(/Air Vice Mar. |Br. |Dr. Rm. |Dr. \(Kum.\) |Dr. \(Mrs.\) |Dr. \(Ms.\) |Dr. \(Smt.\) |\(Dr.\) |Dr. |Isai |Kumari |Kum. |Late Shri |Late Smt. |Late \(Smt\) |Maj. Gen. |Maj. |Miss |Ms. |Ms |Nartaki |Prof.\(Dr\) |Prof. \(Dr.\) |Prof. |Prof |Sadhguru |Sheik |Shri |Vice Adm. |Adm. |\(Miss\) |\(Smt.\) |Smt. /,'').replace(/([A-Z][\. ])/,'').split(' ')[0]
